trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> inline.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>内联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> specifies that each data item appears as three <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>指定每个数据项显示为三个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，数据对象是一个名为类`Task`。

trans-unit.source: Note that each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>此模板中的元素绑定到的属性`Task`类。

trans-unit.source: It is more common to define a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 它是更常见的是定义<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>中的资源节，以便它可以是一个可重用的对象，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 现在可以将 `myTaskTemplate` 用作资源，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom logic for choosing a template used to display each item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于选择用来显示每个项的模板的自定义逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> object that provides logic and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> 对象，它提供逻辑并返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> to specify the visualization of the data objects.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>指定的数据对象的可视化效果。

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one template defined and want to supply logic to return a template to use, then you use this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你具有多个模板定义，并想要提供逻辑以返回要使用的模板，然后你使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is ignored if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将忽略此属性，是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> Visual 自定义项中提供极大的灵活性，并提供许多样式和模板化的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>属性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>属性来设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，生成的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控件; 有关<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它们是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控件。

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影响的项的布局，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的对控件的分组，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `auctionItemDataTemplateSelector` resource name (corresponding to an `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class) is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，`auctionItemDataTemplateSelector`资源名称 (对应于`AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector`类) 分配给<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of the `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` class with an override of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的实现`AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector`类的重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法：

trans-unit.source: In this case, within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method of the class, there is logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `SpecialFeatures` property of the `item` object passed.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法类，提供了逻辑来返回适当的模板的值基于`SpecialFeatures`属性`item`传递对象。

trans-unit.source: The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping <xref:System.Windows.Window> element.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的模板文件位于封装的资源<xref:System.Windows.Window>元素。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is directed to automatically call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method of `AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the collection to which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is bound.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>定向以自动调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法`AuctionItemDataTemplateSelector`到的集合中的项的每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>绑定。

trans-unit.source: The call passes the data item as an object.
trans-unit.target: 调用将作为一个对象传递数据项目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> that is returned by the method is then used to display that data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>返回方法然后用于显示该数据项目。

trans-unit.source: For another example, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 另一个示例，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示序列化过程是否应对 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 属性的有效值进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
